content: Our research and development costs for fiscal 2022 totaled $2.2 million, which is a 25% decrease from fiscal 2021 of $3 million due to reduced spending in our marine engineering business related to the Thermite Octal development until we can really gauge both the market and customer requirements for this product offering, as well as a shift in our marine technology business expenditures, away from the capital intensive developmental phase of our real time 3D sonar technology.
